benchmark_details.name: FIDEL-TS
benchmark_details.overview: FIDEL-TS is a new large-scale benchmark for time series forecasting developed under principles of high-fidelity benchmarking, addressing issues in existing datasets by sourcing data from live APIs, ensuring causal soundness, and structural clarity.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a credible evaluation standard for the field of time series forecasting and demonstrate the limitations of prior benchmarks.

data.source: Live APIs providing real-time data streams.
data.size: Over 67 million data points across various datasets.

methodology.calculation: MSE is calculated as the average of the squares of the errors between predicted and actual values.
methodology.interpretation: Lower MSE values indicate better model performance.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data sources are anonymized and used under proper licenses.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data are under a CC0 license or sourced from APIs with academic research permissions.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Adheres to ethical guidelines in data sourcing.
